app.title: lota
app.businessAutomationDesc: Our application is built to free you from routine. Control attendance, manage tasks and clients in one convenient interface.
app.businessAutomationLongDesc: Our application is built to free you from operational routine. Control employee attendance, manage tasks and client relationships in one convenient interface. The system integrates with industry-leading services so you can keep records and operate without extra effort.
app.processOptimizationDesc: Automation minimizes time spent on routine tasks. Track effectiveness, analyze data and make decisions quickly.
app.processOptimizationLongDesc: With an automated approach you minimize the time spent on repetitive tasks. The platform helps you track employee performance, analyze data streams, spot bottlenecks early and make decisions faster.
app.flexibilityDesc: An intuitive interface adapting to your company's needs regardless of scale.
app.flexibilityLongDesc: We provide an intuitive interface that easily adapts to the needs of your business. Regardless of company size, the system helps you structure work in the most efficient way and evolve without friction.
app.analyticsDesc: Reports and data visualization keep you informed and boost team productivity.
app.analyticsLongDesc: Reports and data visualisations keep you aware of ongoing processes. Receive key insights in a clear format and continuously elevate your team's productivity with informed decisions.
app.rateLimitDesc: Please wait a bit and try again.
app.myPeopleSub: Add your friends and colleagues to contacts!
app.userFound: User found, send a request for confirmation.
app.userNotFound: User not found, send an invitation.
app.identityMismatch: Cannot send request: identity mismatch. Please re-login if the problem persists.
app.noPostsDesc: Add your first location to start tracking attendance.

route.label: Route
route.listHint: Combine posts into a route and track progress
route.editWarning: Editing a route will recreate it and reset the current completion history.

form.title: Title
form.postsHint: Add posts in the required order

select.postHint: To view attendance, select a route post.

concept.title: How Routes Work
concept.description: A route is a sequence of locations (posts) that an employee must visit in a specific order.
concept.dataCollection: Statistics are collected automatically: when an employee checks in at posts from the route, the system verifies the correct order and timing.
concept.completedExplain: all posts completed in correct sequence
concept.partialExplain: some posts visited, but not all
concept.pendingExplain: route not started or in progress

stat.totalHint: Total number of route completions for the period
stat.completedHint: Completed all checkpoints in correct order
stat.pendingHint: Not yet completed or in progress

app.atraceCheckingText: We're validating your QR. This will only take a moment.
app.geoConfirmedHint: Check was made within 20 meters from the post location
app.geoNotConfirmedHint: Check was made more than 20 meters from the post location or location data was unavailable
app.geolocationDenied: Geolocation access denied. Please allow location access in browser settings.
app.geolocationUnavailable: Location unavailable. Safari: Check Settings ‚Üí Safari ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Allow. Also verify: 1) Location services enabled, 2) Internet connected, 3) GPS signal available.
app.geolocationTimeout: Location request timeout. Try again in better conditions.
app.limitReachedReadable: Post limit reached ({current}/{max}). Upgrade your plan to create more posts.
app.tourAtraceWelcomeContent: A-Trace is an attendance tracking system. Create locations (posts), add members, and monitor presence.
app.tourAtraceCreateContent: Tap here to create a location. Enter a title, set the address on the map, and choose a PIN for check-ins.
app.tourAtracePostsContent: Your locations will appear here as cards. Switch between them or pick "All locations" for overall stats.
app.tourAtraceTableContent: This table shows attendance stats for each member: work days, attendance, violations, and exceptions.
app.tourAtraceCalculateContent: Use this button to calculate salary data for the selected member.
app.tourAtraceSettingsContent: In settings you can manage members, plan limits etc.
app.tourAtraceHelpContent: Use the life ring button in the header to replay this tutorial anytime.
app.tasksDesc: Manage projects and tasks easily and effectively.
app.clientsDesc: Keep records of your clients and provided services.
app.routesDesc: Plan and monitor employees in real time.
app.reportsDesc: Collect key reports in one place.
app.callsDesc: Track inbound calls and their uniqueness.
app.publicPostInstruction: Scan the QR below to mark your attendance!
app.pinPromptDesc: Enter the 6-digit PIN shown to the post creator. This PIN is required to access the page.
app.pinSecurityNote: Save this PIN securely. It will be required to access the public post page and generate QR codes. Treat it like a password. It cannot be recovered if lost!
app.atraceSettingsSubtitle: Manage members, roles, and working days
app.requiredWorkingDaysHint: Number of days this member should attend per month
app.requiredWorkingHoursHint: Number of hours this member should work per day
app.roleHint: Assign a role to control access permissions
app.timezoneHint: Select your timezone or leave as browser default
app.attendancePermissionError: You don't have permission to view attendance stats.
app.attendanceUnauthorizedError: You are not authorized to view attendance stats.
app.attendancePermissionErrorHint: If you believe this is a mistake ‚Äî contact your administrator.
app.legendHint: Red = violation, Blue = legitimate absence, Orange = time violation
app.timeThresholdsHint: Used to highlight late arrivals and early leaves
app.exportRangeTooLarge: Export range cannot exceed 3 months. Please select a shorter period.
app.choosePlanDescription: Choose a plan that works best for your team

free.description: Free plan to get started with A-Trace

billing.subscriptionPastDue: Your subscription payment is past due.
billing.renewCTA: Please renew your subscription to continue.
billing.renewalInfo: Without an active subscription, you can only view records and generate QR codes. All other features will be unavailable.
billing.expiredMessage: Your subscription has expired. Please renew to access all features.
billing.trialsEndedMessage: Your trial has ended. Subscribe to continue using all features.
billing.featureUnavailable: This feature is unavailable with your current subscription status.
billing.onlyRecordsAvailable: Only records and QR generation are available.
billing.contactSupport: Contact support if you believe this is an error.

members.title: Members Management
members.subtitle: Manage active members and their permissions
members.limitReached: You have reached the maximum number of active members for your plan. Upgrade your plan to add more members.

mini.description: Perfect for small teams. Get started with essential features to track attendance and manage tasks.

start.description: Ideal for growing teams. Everything in Mini plus advanced analytics, custom reports, and priority support.

free.description: Free plan to get started. Basic limits for trying A-Trace.

common.title: Title
common.suspiciousReasons:
Possible reasons:
1. Unfamiliar device (differs from 80% of last 10 check-ins)
2. Device used by multiple people within 24 hours
3. Too many device changes in the last 7 days (more than 3)
common.settingsAccessDenied: You do not have permission to access settings. Only administrators can manage members.
common.namespaceMissing: Namespace is not selected. Please select a namespace.
